Oranges are a great source of vitamin C, which helps to boost the immune system and protect against infection and disease. They are also a good source of dietary fiber, which can help to reduce cholesterol levels and aid in digestion. Additionally, oranges are a great source of potassium, which helps to regulate blood pressure and keep the body hydrated.

Oranges are a good source of vitamins and minerals, including vitamin C, thiamin, folate, and potassium. They are also a good source of dietary fiber and antioxidants. Eating oranges regularly can help boost immunity, improve skin health, and reduce the risk of certain diseases.
